name: Lode Runner IV
overview: Lode Runner IV (disk version) also a fan edit, with bright green bricks. From the 127 levels only 32 are new, the other 95 are copies from Lode Runner II, partially in a different order. A messenger arrived at dawn and brought the news that the precious Egyptian statues, found during the excavations of Giza had been stolen by the insane collector Goldstar who locked them in blocks of graphite and kept them in the hall of his crazy museum. To recover the precious treasure and overcome the assiduous vigilance of the dangerous guardians of the museum, Professor Jones decided to read the papyri of Set, able to give him the power of temporary transmutation of matter. Armed with this ability, he will have to recover the entire haul by misleading the guards with skillful maneuvers and using that power to generate unpredictable pitfalls in the stone to trap or waylay them. Published in Italy as Trafugator in I Magnifici 5 & 7 n.23 (aprile 1987), Hit Parade C64 n.15 (Settembre 1987), and Hit Parade C64 n.64 (Febbraio 1992).
